eula.ui:title: Accept EULA
eula.ui:help: Whether or not to accept the EULA

type.ui:title: Server type
type.ui:help: This can be one of VANILLA, FORGE, SPIGOT, BUKKIT, PAPER, FTBA, SPONGEVANILLA, CURSEFORGE

version.ui:title: Server Version
version.ui:help: One of: LATEST, SNAPSHOT, or a specific version (ie: 1.7.9).

persistWorlds.ui:title: Worlds Persistance
persistWorlds.ui:help: Whether or not to save the worlds between server restarts.
